scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run build:dist && npm run build:components
scripts.build:dist: mkdir -p dist && cp -r main.css assets dist/
scripts.test: htmlhint 'index.html' && stylelint main.css assets/styles/**/*.css && npx linkinator index.html -ro --recurse --skip '(.*\.reddit\.com)|(.*\.twitter\.com)|(.*\.drivethrurpg\.com)' --verbosity debug
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:server
